• Work

New and Approved Used Car and Van Dealers

Listers new site for web

In 2012, I designed the flagship website of Listers Group, a privately owned car and van dealer operating in the West Midlands, UK.

Together with Anthony Williams, we created a mobile strategy for Listers, making the content mobile friendly and scalable. I created wireframes, and designed primarily in the browser.

Listers was also my first real foray into the world of Github.
